nodes.text: Luck Luck Freidal was the operator of an illegal casino in a city. He paid large bribes to the local Imperial authorities for them to overlook his operation, and prided himself on running the cleanest backroom gambling operation in the city. In 0 ABY, the Empire finally raided his casino, and Freidal was killed when he attempted to bribe the officer in charge of the raid. All of Freidal's money was seized, leaving all of the gamblers present at the time, including Lando Calrissian, somewhat poorer.
